name: The Haunted House of Candied Frights
name_original: The Haunted House of Candied Frights
description:
Welcome to The Haunted House of Candied Frights! Explore the area, find candy, and complete mini games. If you collect all six a surprise awaits you... but beware the skeletons watching you!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space bar to jump

Click to interact with objects
